Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class RoundController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.RoundController
public class RoundController
extends java.lang.Object
Class that represents the Controller server side that handle the round phases (move,build,place workers, challenger ...)
Since:
2020/06/26

      Parameters:
      message - Message received from the client with the move
      Returns:
      True if the Win Response is equal to the one sent by the client, false otherwise
